parameters.name: FirewallId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: ShouldRecover
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to restore the traffic redirection configurations. Valid values:

*   true: roll back
*   false: withdraw

parameters.name: TrFirewallRoutePolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the routing policy.

parameters.name: TrFirewallRoutePolicySwitchStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the routing policy. Valid values:

*   open: enabled
*   close: disabled
